items.sentence: It\'s time you went to bed. Turn off the radio.
Keep your door locked and don\'t let anyone in.
Tom doesn\'t have to go if he doesn\'t want to.
Mary wanted to ask a question, but she didn\'t.
Who\'ll take care of the dog while we\'re gone?
I\'ve never met a musician that I didn\'t like.
If only I\'d known that, I wouldn\'t have come.
I never for a moment imagined that I would win.
I often go swimming at the beach in the summer.
I shouldn\'t have done that without permission.
I think Tom and Mary both want to go to Boston.
I took Tom to my favorite restaurant in Boston.
I took my shoes off and put them under the bed.
I tore up all the letters that you wrote to me.
I tried to do everything I could to revive Tom.
I usually eat a couple of sandwiches for lunch.
Tom and Mary don\'t like the same kind of food.
Tom and Mary don\'t really have much in common.
Tom and Mary don\'t seem so sure of themselves.
Tom and Mary are pretty creative, aren\'t they?
